SEARCH
Package org.application.disciplines

Interface IDisciplinesService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DisciplinesService
public interface IDisciplinesService
Represents a service interface for managing Discipline entities. This interface defines the service operations that can be performed, specific to discipline service.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • addDiscipline

      Discipline addDiscipline(String name, int credits) throws DisciplineAdditionException, ValidationException
      Adds a new Discipline with the given name and credits.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new Discipline.
      credits - The number of credits associated with the new Discipline.
      Returns:
      The newly created Discipline.
      Throws:
      DisciplineAdditionException - If the Discipline could not be added.
      ValidationException - If the provided name or credits are invalid.

    • deleteDiscipline

      boolean deleteDiscipline(int disciplineId) throws DisciplineNotFoundException, DisciplineDeletionFailed, ValidationException
      Deletes a Discipline with the given id.
      Parameters:
      disciplineId - The id of the Discipline to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the Discipline was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DisciplineNotFoundException - If the Discipline with the given id was not found.
      DisciplineDeletionFailed - If the Discipline could not be deleted.
      ValidationException - If the provided id is invalid.

    • deleteDisciplines

      boolean deleteDisciplines(String name) throws DisciplineDeletionFailed
      Deletes a Discipline with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Discipline to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the Discipline was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DisciplineDeletionFailed - If the Discipline could not be deleted.

    • deleteAll

      boolean deleteAll() throws DisciplineDeletionFailed
      Deletes all Discipline entities.
      Returns:
      True if all Discipline entities were deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DisciplineDeletionFailed - If the Discipline entities could not be deleted.

    • getDisciplineById

      Discipline getDisciplineById(int disciplineId) throws DisciplineNotFoundException
      Retrieves a Discipline by its ID.
      Parameters:
      disciplineId - The ID of the Discipline to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Discipline with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      DisciplineNotFoundException - If the Discipline with the given ID was not found.

    • getDisciplines

      List<Discipline> getDisciplines()
      Retrieves all Discipline entities.
      Returns:
      A list of all Discipline entities.

    • addTeacherToDiscipline

      Discipline addTeacherToDiscipline(String teacherName, String disciplineName) throws TeacherNotFoundException, DisciplineNotFoundException
      Adds a teacher to a discipline.
      Parameters:
      teacherName - The name of the teacher to add.
      disciplineName - The name of the discipline to add the teacher to.
      Returns:
      The discipline with the added teacher.
      Throws:
      TeacherNotFoundException - If the teacher with the given name was not found.
      DisciplineNotFoundException - If the discipline with the given name was not found.
